inlineContent.text: Welcome to the Man In The Middle Attack tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn about the importance of using SSL Pinning to avoid man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks and protect your app’s communication.

You’ll begin by finding the hashed public key for the swapi.dev domain using the SSL Labs website. Then, depending on whether you are using iOS or Android, you’ll follow the appropriate steps to implement SSL Pinning in your app’s configuration.

By doing this, you can ensure that your app’s communication is secure and resilient against potential MITM attacks. Just remember to revert the changes when you quit Proxyman or Charles to ensure your emulators continue to work normally.

tasks.title: Avoid MITM by using SSL Pinning

inlineContent.text: to avoid having any proxy or man in the middle attack for your products
If you are using iOS do these step otherwise; scroll to the android steps:
Close Proxyman or Charles and try to run the app.
If you are using Android do this:
Close Proxyman or Charles and try to run the app.
Please Revert when you quit Proxyman to make Android Emulators work normally.

abstract.text: Welcome to the Advanced Usage tutorial, where you’ll learn how to master this powerful tool to take your network debugging skills to the next level! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll discover how to save, import, and export requests and responses, map local responses, simulate various network conditions, manage block/allow lists, and explore extra features exclusive to certain network debugging tools. Get ready to become a network debugging expert and make your app development process even more efficient.

Welcome to the Advanced Usage tutorial, where you’ll learn how to master this powerful tool to take your network debugging skills to the next level! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll discover how to save, import, and export requests and responses, map local responses, simulate various network conditions, manage block/allow lists, and explore extra features exclusive to certain network debugging tools. Get ready to become a network debugging expert and make your app development process even more efficient.

Welcome to the Ultimate Network Debugging Tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn a variety of techniques to debug network-related issues in your app. To get started, you’ll first download a sample project from GitHub that will serve as a practical example for applying the concepts covered in this tutorial.

Welcome to the App Inspection tutorial! In this brief yet informative guide, you’ll learn how to track all network traffic on your device and inspect the details of requests and responses going through www.swapi.dev. Get ready to enhance your network debugging capabilities by mastering the art of app inspection with powerful tools like Proxyman and Charles.

doc://com.raywenderlich.StarCharles/tuto.title: Avoid MITM by using SSL Pinning

abstract.text: Welcome to the Man In The Middle Attack tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn about the importance of using SSL Pinning to avoid man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks and protect your app’s communication.

Welcome to the Basic Proxying tutorial! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll learn how to inspect your app in greater detail and effectively collaborate with back-end developers by sending cURL requests and responses. You’ll also discover how to map network traffic, use breakpoints to manipulate data on-the-fly, and leverage the Repeat tool to resend requests without client involvement. Prepare to dive deep into the world of network debugging and enhance your skills in proxying and app inspection.
